title: Video of Motorists Being Sprayed by Water From Pak, Not Rajasthan
subtitle: Viral Video Fact Check: A video showing motorists on the road being sprayed by a water hose is viral on social media with the claim that it is from Rajasthan, where the heat has supposedly reached 52 degrees.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video, while not edited in any manner, is not from Rajasthan as claimed, but from Pakistan. This is evident from the Dawn News logo that is visible at the bottom right corner of the video.

WHAT WE FOUND OUT

On breaking down the video into key frames using the InVid software and running a reverse image search on one of the key frames, it was found that the video was uploaded on 30 May 2018 on the Pakistani news channel's Youtube channel.
